ENGLISH: Your ambition to renew the Old Realms give you right of Subjugation of their Territory
Unite the Lands of the Silvan
You've come to the belief that the Elvish Realms must unite, by any means
Unite the Lands of the Anadune
You've come to the belief that the Anadune Realms must unite, by any means
Unite the Lands of the Arnor
You've come to the belief that the Arnor Realms must unite, by any means
You've come to the belief that the Realms of Men must unite, by any means

While out on a progress journey Middle Earth, you stumble upon a most ancient ruin. Though you've been to the location before, you remember the ruins not, so you make approach. As you grow close, both dread and wonder rise within you.

You make entrance into the structure and find the grounds dark but well kempt. You put spark to a torch and the embers alight the area, revealing 3 doorways marked with ancient runes. As you focus on them, they morph into your understanding.
I take the Hall of Legends
The Hall of Masters is for me
I will explore the Hall of Heroes

You find yourself in a great Hall, the twilight twinkling in through craved apertures in the ceiling. Around you stand grand Statues of noble warriors and crafters, marked with the same runes as the previous room.

You find yourself in a great Hall brightly lit by several burning braziers along the near wall. You look about and find that the Hall is a adorned with many magnificent works of art, below each is the same runes as before.

You find yourself in a great Hall, the area filled with brilliant golden light. The light emanates from 3 Marvelous Gold figures at the back of the room. Approaching them you find the same runes as the previous room.
I wish to view the Masters' Work
The runes etched in a placard in the ground near the door read, James Fox

As you reach the center of the room, you come to a small altar, atop it sits a statue of several hands clasping one another. The runes about the statue read, 'here lies our tribute to all those who, named and not, who've made Middle Earth what it is'
Go Back to the First Room

You come to the central statue of a noble king, runes at its base transform into common, they read 'Dedicated to TSF4'
You come the to right hand statue, this one of an artist, brush and pallette in hand, its runes form to read 'Dedicated to Marowa'
Finally, the left hand statue is a of Court Fool poised in speech, no doubt a jocular barb, its runes read ' Dedicated to SinStar87'
Betwixt the three is a plaque and upon it is inscribed, 'In tribute to the Three who keep live the world'
Go Back to the First Room
You make make obedience to the Statues and find yourself filled with new prideful purpose.
The statues begin to chuckle as bright light floods in and music plays. You soon find yourself back outside, the temple nowhere to be seen.
As you make entrance, the ancient structure shifts as a bright light bursts forth and music rings out.
